code: var priceFormatter=function priceFormatter(price){if(price>99999&&price<10000000){var dec=price.toString().slice(-5,-3);price=price.toString().slice(0,-5);return price+"."+dec+" L";}else if(price>9999999){var _dec=price.toString().slice(-7,-5);price=price.toString().slice(0,-7);return price+"."+_dec+" Cr";}else{return price;}};export default priceFormatter;
